title: How Is Biden’s ‘GREAT’ Economy Working for You? | 6/13/22
description:
Glenn’s trips to Subway and the gas station reminded him just how “great” the Biden economy is. Meanwhile, the Russian ruble is one of the only currencies doing well. Glenn and Stu review the latest Supreme Court rulings and what’s still to come. The Founding Fathers made a crucial mistake that Congress is exploiting. A Google employee is warning that its A.I. has become sentient. Country music star Toby Keith has cancer. Is Aaron Rodgers’ girlfriend a witch? Glenn can’t take it any more, as the White House insists the economy is strong. A Biden official claims the market is “driving” the green transition, but Glenn wouldn’t call it the “free” market: It’s ESG. A new chart reveals how Biden’s “Putin’s price hike” excuse is a lie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
